verses.verse: In you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, I take refuge. <S%H2620><s%> Never <S%H408><s%> let me be disappointed. <S%H954><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me in your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and rescue <S%H6403><s%> me. <S%H5186><s%> Turn your ear <S%H241><s%> to me, <S%H3467><s%> and save me.

Be to me a rock <S%H6697><s%> of refuge <S%H4583><s%> to which I may always <S%H8548><s%> go. <S%H935><s%> Give the command <S%H6680><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me, <S%H5553><s%> for you are my rock and my fortress. <S%H4686><s%>
Rescue <S%H6403><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> my God, from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the unrighteous <S%H7563><s%> and cruel man. <S%H2556><s%>
For you are my hope, <S%H8615><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3069><s%> my confidence <S%H4009><s%> from my youth. <S%H5271><s%>

I have relied <S%H5564><s%> on you from the womb. <S%H990><s%> You are he who took <S%H1491><s%> me out of my mother <S%H517><s%>'s womb. <S%H4578><s%> I will always <S%H8548><s%> praise you. <S%H8416><s%>
I am a marvel <S%H4159><s%> to many, <S%H7227><s%> but you are my strong <S%H5797><s%> refuge. <S%H4268><s%>
My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with your praise, <S%H8416><s%> with your honor <S%H8597><s%> all the day. <S%H3117><s%>
Don't <S%H7993><s%> reject me in my old age. <S%H2209><s%> Don't <S%H5800><s%> forsake me when <S%H6256><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> fails. <S%H3615><s%>
For my enemies <S%H341><s%> talk <S%H559><s%> about me. <S%H8104><s%> Those who watch for my soul <S%H5315><s%> conspire <S%H3289><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%>
saying, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> him. <S%H7291><s%> Pursue and take <S%H8610><s%> him, <S%H5337><s%> for no one will rescue him."
God, <S%H430><s%> don't <S%H7368><s%> be far from me. <S%H430><s%> My God, hurry <S%H2363><s%> to help me. <S%H5833><s%>

Let my <S%H5315><s%> accusers <S%H7853><s%> be disappointed <S%H954><s%> and consumed. <S%H3615><s%> Let them be covered <S%H5844><s%> with disgrace <S%H2781><s%> and scorn <S%H3639><s%> who want <S%H1245><s%> to harm me. <S%H7451><s%>
But I will always <S%H8548><s%> hope, <S%H3176><s%> and will add <S%H3254><s%> to all <S%H3254><s%> of your praise. <S%H8416><s%>

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> will tell <S%H5608><s%> about your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and of your salvation <S%H8668><s%> all day, <S%H3117><s%> though I don't <S%H3045><s%> know its full measure. <S%H5615><s%>
I will come <S%H935><s%> with the mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H136><s%> I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> even of yours alone.
God, <S%H430><s%> you have taught <S%H3925><s%> me from my youth. <S%H5271><s%> Until now, <S%H5046><s%> I have declared your wondrous works. <S%H6381><s%>

Yes, <S%H5704><s%> even when I am old <S%H2209><s%> and gray-haired, <S%H7872><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> don't <S%H5800><s%> forsake me, <S%H5046><s%> until I have declared your strength <S%H2220><s%> to the next generation, <S%H1755><s%> your might <S%H1369><s%> to everyone who is to come. <S%H935><s%>
Your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> also, <S%H430><s%> God, reaches to the heavens; <S%H4791><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> great things. <S%H1419><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> who is like you?

You, <S%H7200><s%> who have shown us many <S%H7227><s%> and bitter <S%H7451><s%> troubles, <S%H6869><s%> you will let <S%H7725><s%> me live. <S%H2421><s%> You will bring us up <S%H5927><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H8415><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Increase <S%H7235><s%> my honor, <S%H1420><s%> and comfort <S%H5162><s%> me again. <S%H5437><s%>

I will also praise <S%H3034><s%> you with the harp <S%H3627><s%> for your faithfulness, <S%H571><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%> I sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to you with the lyre, <S%H3658><s%> Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
My lips <S%H8193><s%> shall shout for joy! <S%H7442><s%> My soul, <S%H5315><s%> which you have redeemed, <S%H6299><s%> sings praises to you! <S%H2167><s%>

My tongue <S%H3956><s%> will also talk <S%H1897><s%> about your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> all day <S%H3117><s%> long, <S%H954><s%> for they are disappointed, and they are confounded, <S%H954><s%> who want <S%H1245><s%> to harm me. <S%H7451><s%>
